question.body: Which of the following is the correct order of tubules after the glomerular capsule?

multiple_choice.choice: proximal convoluted tubule, nephron loop, distal convoluted tubule, collecting duct
proximal convoluted tubule, distal convoluted tubule, loop of Henle, collecting duct
loop of Henle, proximal convoluted tubule, distal convoluted tubule, collecting duct
collecting duct, proximal convoluted tubule, distal convoluted tubule, loop of Henle

response.feedback: Incorrect. The correct order of the components of the nephron are glomerular capsule, proximal convoluted tuble, neohron loop, and distal convoluted tubule. The disatl convoluted tubule empties into the collecting duct.

Incorrect. The correct order of the components of the nephron are glomerular capsule, proximal convoluted tuble, neohron loop, and distal convoluted tubule. The disatl convoluted tubule empties into the collecting duct.

Incorrect. The correct order of the components of the nephron are glomerular capsule, proximal convoluted tuble, neohron loop, and distal convoluted tubule. The disatl convoluted tubule empties into the collecting duct.
